description: The Corsair Flash Survivor is extremely durable, water resistant, drop-tested flash USB memory drive. It delivers the highest value/performance solution for a rugged USB drive. From it's CNC-milled, 6061 Type 2 Aluminum enclosure to the EDPM waterproof seal, the Flash Survivor is built for action. "Flash Survivor - BRING IT ON!"
title: Corsair Flash Survivor 16 GB USB 2.0 Flash Drive CMFUSBSRVR-16GB
